Ceres

Discoverer:
Giuseppe Piazzi
Discovered:
1801-01-01
Orbital Period:
4.6 years
Mean Radius:
487 km
Axial Tilt:
3°

Ceres is the largest asteroid and the only dwarf planet in the inner Solar System.
